thread.title: Free $7.99 Paranormal Activity digital download with AMC Theatres ticket purchase.
thread.title_full: Free $7.99 Paranormal Activity digital download with AMC Theatres ticket purchase. - Sun Sentinel

author: Doreen Christensen
title: Free $7.99 Paranormal Activity digital download with AMC Theatres ticket purchase.
text:
Get a free $7.99 digital download of a "Paranormal Activity" HD movie with advanced purchase of a move ticket at AMC Theatres.
Buy a ticket at participating theaters to see "Paranormal Activity: Ghost Dimension," out Friday, to get a code good for a free movie on ParamountMovies.com .
Choose from "Paranormal Activity" 1-4 or "Paranormal Activity: The Marked Ones" on ParamountMovies.com .
The fifth and final film reveals the hell-raising demon Toby.
Click here for the deal. The offer ends on Thursday, Oct. 22.
Wendy's $1 Halloween Book has five Jr. Frosty coupons Doreen Christensen Stop in at Wendy's for $1 Halloween Books with Jr. Frosty coupons.
Get five frozen treats in exchange for your dollar donation, which benefits the Dave Thomas Foundation for Adoption . Coupons can be redeemed Nov. 2 thorugh Jan. 31.
The Halloween Coupon Books make a great candy-free option to drop...
